summary: Aruba is a small country in the Caribbean Sea, part of the Kingdom of the Netherlands. It's located near Venezuela and is known for its dry, sunny climate, which is different from the humid weather in most of the Caribbean. Aruba has a population of around 108,000 people and is divided into eight regions. Its capital is Oranjestad. It became a separate country within the Netherlands in 1986 and is one of the ABC islands, along with Bonaire and Cura√ßao.
title: Aruba
